InfoDetail.title: Lambda class T-4a Shuttle
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: The Lambda Class Shuttle, is a multi-purpose transport with a trihedral foil design used by the First Order

InfoDetail.title: TIE-Advanced x1
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: The TIE Advanced x1, also known as "TIE/x1" or "TIE Interceptor prototype", was an advanced prototype starfighter touted as a replacement for the standard TIE Fighter

InfoDetail.title: TIE/IN starfighter
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: Interceptors were fast and maneuverable starfighters. They were designed specifically to target, hunt down, and destroy enemy fighters and bombers, hence the name interceptor, and thus were generally unsuited to carrying heavy bombing payloads. Interceptors could also be used for reconnaissance due to their high speed.

InfoDetail.title: TIE/SA Bomber
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: The TIE/sa bomber, simply known as the TIE bomber was a larger, less maneuverable TIE starfighter used for destroying large starships and pinpoint-precision bombing. The "sa" in the TIE bomber's designation stood for "surface assault."

InfoDetail.title: TIE/LN Fighter
InfoDetail.textInfoDetail: TIEs were designed to attack in large numbers, overwhelming the enemy craft. Standard attack squadrons consisted of 12 fighters while full attack wings were made up of six squadrons
